Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I really want to discuss how KSP is going in the Youtube community but more importantly I would like to create awareness of different channels out there (this includes dead or even deleted channels). So, I kindly ask if you guys would please post names (preferably links) of Youtubers that focus most of there content on KSP.

These are some (probably all) that I am aware off:

-Hocgaming -SuestraGamingHD

-Scottmanley -Danny2462

-G4Virus -The Solar Gamer

-Cruzan AK -Chickenkeeper24

-vaos3712 -TheMattDennis16

-Macey Dean - xXLeGoldFishXx

-PleborianLives -OperationDx1

-trydyingtolive -Kerbal Space Program

-TheWinterOwl

Thanks,

Chris
http://www.youtube.com/user/5fhHorseman
Abyssal Lurker

I do KSP videos as well, link to channel: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UChO6u5kMMBGQmj8PtipjqCQ

Edited February 13, 2014 by Richy teh space man
HOC Gaming.
Robbaz, Heretic391, Kurtjmac

Cupcakelanders, EnterElysium, Nassault.

We should probably make an organised list of this...

http://www.youtube.com/user/5fhHorseman

Cheers!

I do mostly KSP videos http://www.youtube.com/user/coreross

Got a big series on the campaign at the moment and got a mobile base on Duna and uploading this week about my shuttle and hopefully going to send a plane to Laythe early next week.
My channel Korbital Mechanics is entirely KSP related content.
I love Danny's vids even though there is no commentary other than the text onscreen. I also love the fact that he can break the game in soooooo many ways heh.

I will do a self plug http://www.youtube.com/user/onderzeesteen

Almost exclusively KSP videos, currently I'm playing a series in Real Solar System focused on getting stuff to Mars in career mode(mostly been to other places thus far though because launch windows) with the help of KSP Interstellar.

I also have a scant few tutorials and 'what the hell is this'-type videos.

Hi Chris!

I love KSP fans. When I first started recording, I waited days sometimes weeks to look at comments. Slowly I realized KSP fans are different. No spam, no hate, just helpful advice and positive reinforcement. I feel so lucky everyday that I found KSP. Normally I get bored with a game very quickly, yet here I am almost 2 years later still having fun. I produce 2 shows now, Insane Science Division(mission oriented and more personal) and the classic, Insane Rockets Division(I let my brain completely melt and see what happens). A link to my channel is in the signature.

May the Kraken become confused on it's way to your ship,

Thor
E: Arggh, didn't read OP thoroughly enough.

Nassault!! http://m.youtube.com/user/Nassault630?desktop_uri=%2Fuser%2FNassault630

And my own YT Channel, i wonna to make a "two language channel". At the Moment my Videos are on german, but I plan to translate them to english too. What do you think about that idea? =)

http://m.youtube.com/channel/UCvEftEP1HK3N8YtGYG85-_Q

Nassault!! http://m.youtube.com/user/Nassault630?desktop_uri=%2Fuser%2FNassault630

And my own YT Channel, i wonna to make a "two language channel". At the Moment my Videos are on german, but I plan to translate them to english too. What do you think about that idea? =)

http://m.youtube.com/channel/UCvEftEP1HK3N8YtGYG85-_Q

I'm looking to improve my German, so I will definitely be watching some of your videos!

I've been thinking about starting my own channel at some point. I would like to develop a little bit more mastery of KSP before starting though.
Great work everyone! Keep it up btw I am Heretic391
I am trying to get my youtube channel up and running, currently focusing on KSP, http://www.youtube.com/Cheezfriend

While I do have other games on my channel I do KSP also, right KSP is on hold sort of due to having classes right now needing me to be more focused. A lesson learned while filming my second half of my Mun landing science video . Link to my channel can be is here: https://www.youtube.com/user/Liowen/videos
I have a Youtube thingy too, hereÃ‚Â´s the trailer and welcome aboard if you subscribe

Since everyone else is spamming their channel I might as well do the same: http://www.youtube.com/user/bloxyman22/videos

Been a while since I did a KSP video though.. Basically just silly experiments/kerbal funfair rides with no commentary.

If I had the ability to do some proper commentary I would have done some real space related missions.
I'll make some tutorial videos in my native language, soon.
I make a KSP letsplay, too. It's called

Gordon Gillespie, he is doing a series on Better Than Starting Manned with Deadly Reentry

http://www.youtube.com/user/Elodia7772/videos

I make KSP content on a channel recently started. Videos are mostly KSP on both Channels.

Main Channel: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbpRRJY2ML2Ek1eaVVCelbw (KSP mod Reviews Tuttorials and Other Such Things)

Second Channel: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSfECHLPdizF5ud1cdpP1Mw (Gaming mainly KSP and a bit of mc here and there)

If you do have a look I really appericiate it so thanks in advance
